rukus.text: 16|1|An la de mingling biding lailin, suoyi nimen bubi yaoqiu qi zaori shixian, zansong an la chaojue wanwu, ta chao hu tamen suoyong yi pei ta de.

16|2|Ta shi tianshimen feng ta de mingling, xietong jingshen, jianglin tasuo yiyu de puren, shuo:“Nimen yingdang jinggao shiren shuo: Chu wo zhi wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de, suoyi nimen yingdang jingwei wo.”
16|3|Ta ping zhenli chuangzaole tiandi, ta chao hu tamen suoyong yi pei ta de.
16|4|Ta yong jingye chuangzaole ren, er ren que turan bian chengle mingxian de duishou.
16|5|Ta chuangzaole shengchu, nimen keyi qi mao he pi yuhan, keyi qi ru he rou chongji, hai you xuduo yichu.
16|6|Nimen ba shengchu gan hui jia huo fang chuqu chi cao de shihou, shengchu duiyu nimen dou you guangcai.
16|7|Shengchu ba nimen de huowu tuo yun dao nimen xu jing kunnan caineng daoda di difang qu. Nimen de zhu que shi zhiren de, que shi zhi ci de.
16|8|Ta chuangzao ma, luo, lu, yi gong nimen qi cheng, yi zuo nimen de zhuangshi. Ta hai chuangzao nimen suo bu zhidao de dongxi.
16|9|An la fuze zhishi zhengdao de zeren. Youxie daolu shi pian xie de, jiaruo ta yiyu, ta bi jiang nimen quanti yinru zhengdao.
